article_metadata.news-keywords: sc, politics, columbia, democrats, jefferson jackson
article_metadata.description: S.C. Democrats honored Charleston Mayor Joe Riley at their annual Jefferson Jackson dinner Friday night. Riley retires this year after 40 years in office.
article_metadata.title: SC Democrats salute Charleston mayor’s career | The State
